summary: This little plugin gives the Ebony Helmet the appearance of the Nightingale Hood (cowl)
descriptionHtml:
This little plugin gives the Ebony Helmet the appearance of the Nightingale Hood (cowl). Looks best with the mod [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1896]Nightingale Prime[/url] and [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2544]Amazing Ebony Armor Redone[/url].

Also very interesting for Ebony Armor lovers (like me): [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2507]Ebony Armor Matching Set Fix[/url]

[youtube]XtAEqc9T3aA[/youtube]


[b][u]Installation:[/u][/b]

Automatic: Just use the Nexus Mod Manager.
Manually: Extract the file Ebony_Helmet_with_Nightingale_Appearance.esp to the folder [...]\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data.

[color=red]Afterwards you have to activate it from the Skyrim launcher data menu or in Nexus Mod Manager in the Plugins tab. Check your skyrimprefs.ini file (folder [...]/My Documents/My games/Skyrim/). Make sure you have bEnableFileSelection=1 in SkyrimPrefs.ini under [Launcher]. Otherwise the data files menu in the Skyrim launcher won\'t appear and the mod won\'t work.[/color]


Have fun!


[b][u]My mods:[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3558]Dragon Cleric - Dragonplate Armor replacement[/url]
author: DankRafft
